title: SCSO investigates shooting at Waterford Apartments
content:
MEMPHIS, Tenn. — Shelby County Deputies are investigating a shooting in the 8100 block of Waterford Circle at the Waterford Apartment Complex.
A 17-year-old was shot in the leg and transported to Regional Medical Center in stable condition.
Deputies tell WREG, the witness advised he and his friend were sitting on the couch at his apartment when his friend pulled out a gun and started playing with the hammer cause it to accidentally fire.
The 17-year-old victim was charged with reckless endangerment and was transported to Juvenile Court.
